# 牛客笔面试必备—算法学习笔记之数据处理精讲 

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang
niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang
niuke-bi-mianshi-bibei-suanfa-xuexi-biji-zhi-shujuchuli-jingjiang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
